DOC.brief_summary: This study determine whether CT formulation famotidine take without water bioequivalent FCT formulation . The primary hypothesis area concentration-time curve ( AUC ) maximum plasma concentration ( Cmax ) single dose famotidine 20 mg CT without water equivalent single dose famotidine 20 mg FCT water .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Assess Bioequivalence Famotidine Chewable Tablets Film-Coated Tablets ( 0208-144 )
